code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TransactionHistory=_ref=>{let{transactions,deleteTransaction}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"transaction-history",children:transactions.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No transactions found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:transactions.map(transaction=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"transaction-card bg-white p-4 rounded-md shadow-lg flex justify-between items-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:["$",Math.abs(transaction.amount)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500",children:transaction.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`badge px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-semibold ${transaction.type==='Income'?'bg-green-100 text-green-600':'bg-red-100 text-red-600'}`,children:transaction.type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteTransaction(transaction.id),className:"text-red-500 hover:text-red-700",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F"})]})]},transaction.id))})});};export default TransactionHistory;
